Package com.barryholroyd.evermore.contacts.service

Reads contacts from the local address book and loads them into the SQLite database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContactsIntentService  

Package com.barryholroyd.evermore.contacts.service Description

Reads contacts from the local address book and loads them into the SQLite database.

All syncs, including the initial load, occur as follows.

  1. A hashmap of the existing (old) Contacts is made.
  2. We get a list of all the "new" Contacts from the Contact Provider.
  3. We process each "new" Contacts as follows.
    1. Add the latitude and longitude, if available (use the one from the old Contact if that contact already exists in the database).
    2. Insert or update the "new" Contact (overwriting the old one, even if they are identical).
    3. Keep a list of the inserted or updated Contacts.
    Walk through the old list and delete any that aren't on the list.
During the initial load only, the user is kept informed of progress via a ProgressBar.
See Also:
com.barryholroyd.evermore.contacts, com.barryholroyd.evermore.progressbar
